resources.string:
Developed by: Suhaib Khan

Note:-
This app works by smartly changing the state of your internet connection. So, you can read/write messages when hiding last seen and the written messages will be sent once you close WhatsApp.
Hide your ass from your exes or anyone you wanna ignore by hiding your last seen timestamp in WhatsApp. Use WhatsApp without letting anyone know that you are online.
Please check whatever you\'re using to access internet.
